com.eis.greenenergy.help

Class PredictionEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eis.greenenergy.help.PredictionEntry

  • public class PredictionEntry
extends java.lang.Object
    An instance of this class represents an entry in the energy prediction list.
    This auxiliary class supports the customized appearance of the ListView in the application's detail view. Each object of this class consists of the entry's label, the entry's position in the ListView, the percentage of green energy, and a boolean value which indicates whether this entry was selected, or not.
    Since:
    2014-08-23
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Veronika Henk, Sarvenaz Golchin, Mahnaz Hajibaba

      (package private) boolean selected
      Indicates whether an entry in the prediction ListView was checked.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PredictionEntry

        public PredictionEntry(java.lang.String name,
               boolean selected,
               int id,
               double amount)
        The information given as parameters are assigned to the class variables (name, selected, id, amount).
        The boolean value selected indicates whether the entry which is represented by an instance of this class was selected in the ListView, or not.
        Parameters:
        name - Label for this entry of the prediction list.
        selected - true if this entry was selected in the ListView by the user;
        false otherwise.
        id - Position of this entry in the ListView.
        amount - Percentage of green energy in relation to conventional energies.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Get method to access the id for this entry of the energy prediction list.
        Returns:
        Id of this entry, which represents the entry's position in the ListView.

      • getAmount

        public double getAmount()
        Get method to access the green energy amount for this entry of the energy prediction list.
        Returns:
        Percentage of green energy in relation to conventional energies, which is displayed in the ListView.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Get method to access the label for this entry of the energy prediction list.
        Returns:
        Name of this entry, which is then displayed in the detail view's ListView.

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)
        Set method to edit the label for this entry of the energy prediction list.
        Parameters:
        name - Label of this entry, which should be displayed in the detail view's ListView.

      • isSelected

        public boolean isSelected()
        Method to access the state of this entry of the energy prediction list.
        Returns:
        Boolean value selected, which indicates if the user selected this entry in the ListView, or not.

      • setSelected

        public void setSelected(boolean selected)
        Set method to edit the state of this entry of the energy prediction list.
        This method is called, when the user selected an entry in the ListView.
        Parameters:
        selected - true if this entry was tapped in the ListView;
        false otherwise.
